chisen: 你做得很差勁,我對你非常失望。
engsen: You did a lousy job . I'm very disappointed in you .

chisen: 傳統上,華人農民遵循農曆。
engsen: Traditionally , Chinese farmers follow the lunar calendar .

chisen: 太陽系中曾經有九顆行星,現在只有八顆。
engsen: There used to be nine planets in the solar system . Now there are only eight .

chisen: 如今社會上存在著許多問題。
engsen: There is a multitude of problems in the society nowadays .

chisen: Samuel 向他朋友小聲說話,因為他不想讓其他人聽到。
engsen: Samuel murmured to his friend because he didn't want the others to hear .

chisen: 你的鬍子有一些番茄醬,你要紙巾嗎？
engsen: There is some ketchup on your mustache . Do you need a tissue ?

chisen: 如果你想要鍛鍊肌肉，你需要多攝食蛋白質
engsen: You need to eat more protein if you want to build your muscles .

chisen: 這日曆的每一頁都有一古老諺語
engsen: There an old proverb on each page the calendar .

chisen: 有一說法是所有宣傳都是好宣傳
engsen: There is a saying that goes, “ All publicity good publicity .

chisen: 貝多芬的交響樂是大部分的人都很熟悉的經典
engsen: Beethoven's symphonies are classics that are familiar to many people .

chisen: Mike 剛失去他的爸爸，我們必須向他表示同情
engsen: Mike just lost his father . We must show him our sympathy .

chisen: 我喜歡在鬆餅上加很多的楓糖糖漿
engsen: I like to put lots of maple syrup on my pancakes .

chisen: 早在十九世紀和二十世紀初,當人們有緊急消息時,就會發送電報
engsen: Back in the nineteenth and early twentieth century , people would send telegrams when they had urgent news .

chisen: 這臺電報機現在是古董
engsen: This telegraph machine is now an antique .

chisen: 你不能從這邊過馬路,你必須使用地下通道
engsen: You can't cross the street from here . You must use the underpass .

chisen: 新學生試圖加入其他學生的談話但徒勞無功
engsen: The new student tried to join other students' conversations but in vain .

chisen: Alice 是一個如此虛榮的女孩,她只在乎她的外貌
engsen: Alice is such a vain girl , She only cares about her looks .

chisen: 麵包師放了一些胡桃在巧克力蛋糕裡面。
engsen: The baker put some walnuts into the chocolate cake .

chisen: 我國有一個良好的福利制度。
engsen: Our country has a good welfare system .
